clients

Class RestfClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • clients.RestfClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client

    public class RestfClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements Client
    the client used to execute a RestfRequest and also can be single instated to handle Restf web service Request Some properites like proxy you can configured in the file which path is "%userprofile%\.rest-client\rest-client.properties", that file will be generated after you executed a request on time. if it does not appear, please add it mannually.
    Author:
    zhangyutao
